channel.title: Client Side ERROR!
channel.description:
Ok, i get this error, when i try to run my client...
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My friend told me to change the EGUI, in the .bat to Client
so i did and it came up with this:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Client Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone know a way to fix this error?

item.title: Client Side ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @Rolling_On_Java Rolling On Java
item.description:
@Rolling_On_Java wrote:

Yep, i am, i still tried but buzzed at me lol

anyone else?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Side ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“zauruke, post:2, topic:66828”]copy and past this in “textpad” for runserver.

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 09:51:35 AM[/size][hr]runserver after that and tell me if it works.[/quote]

He is talking about a client named Endar 4. Not a server.

Read full topic
